abstract: Teenage boy is charged with crimes including possession of weapon on school grounds after bringing unloaded gun to high school in Crown Heights, Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: The 14-year-old boy’s weapon, a 9-millimeter semiautomatic handgun, was unloaded, but the magazines included nine rounds, the police said.

headline.main: Boy With Gun at Brooklyn Middle School Is Charged
headline.print_headline: Teenager Charged  With Having Gun at Middle School

snippet: The 14-year-old boy’s weapon, a 9-millimeter semiautomatic handgun, was unloaded, but the magazines included nine rounds, the police said.
